data.comment: Today's referee, Minoru Tojo, has blown to start the match.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Sapporo.
Kashiwa push upfield but Minoru Tojo quickly pulls them for offside.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 3, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga breaks free at Sapporo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minoru Tojo awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 6, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In Sapporo, Sapporo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 15, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 17, Free kick Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sapporo.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In the minute 20, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Sapporo.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 28, Sapporo have a goal kick.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 33, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Kashiwa.
Taiyo Koga (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Minoru Tojo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Sapporo.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Michael Olunga of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, At Sapporo the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Sapporo.
Free kick Kashiwa.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
At Sapporo, Sapporo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 51, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hidekazu Otani heads in to make it 0-1 at Sapporo.
Great play from Masatoshi Mihara to set up the goal.
In the minute 53, Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sapporo.
Sapporo attack but Yoshiaki Komai's header doesn't find the target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Sapporo make their first substitution with Anderson Lopes replacing Takuro Kaneko.
In the minute 56, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 61, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Douglas is replacing Tomoki Takamine for the home team.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's third substitution at Sapporo with Akito Fukumori replacing Ryosuke Shindo.
In the minute 63, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Kashiwa.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 72, Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
Richardson is on a sub for Masatoshi Mihara for Kashiwa.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a second substitution, with Shunki Takahashi replacing Kengo Kitazume.
In the minute 75, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sapporo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 78, Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Lucas Fernandes with Tsuyoshi Ogashiwa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
The home team replace Takuma Arano with Hiroki Miyazawa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Hiroto Goya is replacing Michael Olunga for Kashiwa at Sapporo.
In the minute 86, In Sapporo Sapporo attack through Tsuyoshi Ogashiwa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sapporo.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
In Sapporo, Sapporo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Kashiwa's area.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Kashiwa make their fourth substitution with Hiromu Mitsumaru replacing Hayato Nakama.
